content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> "The last dandelion" what do you think about that caption?

The style of targeted observation is particularly effective here because it encourages the user to reflect on the components of the droodle and how they relate to their chosen caption. By prompting the user to describe their visual experience and what stands out to them, we can deepen their understanding of the image and potentially lead them to more innovative and nuanced caption ideas.
